description: This file defines an ErrorBoundary React component that captures JavaScript errors in child components, displays a fallback UI, and provides reset and navigation options.

classes.name: ErrorBoundary
classes.description: A React component implementing an error boundary with customizable fallback UI, error resetting, and error handling.

methods.name: resetErrorBoundary
methods.description: Resets the error state, allowing the child components to re-render without error.

methods.name: getDerivedStateFromError
methods.description: Static method that updates state when an error is caught, storing the error.

methods.name: componentDidCatch
methods.description: Lifecycle method to handle errors after they've been thrown, invoking the optional onError callback.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders either the children or the fallback UI if an error has occurred.
